TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Overlapped extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 Win32 OVERLAPPED 结构的托管表现形式，包括从 实例向 结构传输信息的方法。

span.span: Provides a managed representation of a Win32 OVERLAPPED structure, including methods to transfer information from an instance to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法传输信息从对象传递给结构，它可以传递给 Win32 API 函数以用于异步文件 I/O。The and methods transfer information from an object to a structure that can be passed to Win32 API functions for asynchronous file I/O. 方法传输的信息从结构的实例类。The method transfers information from a structure to an instance of the class. 更改的属性为对象会影响其关联结构，反之亦然。Changes to the properties of an object affect its associated structure, and vice versa.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public Overlapped (int offsetLo, int offsetHi, int hEvent, IAsyncResult ar);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 offsetLo, int32 offsetHi, int32 hEvent, class System.IAsyncResult ar) cil managed
Public Sub New (offsetLo As Integer, offsetHi As Integer, hEvent As Integer, ar As IAsyncResult)
public: Overlapped(int offsetLo, int offsetHi, int hEvent, IAsyncResult ^ ar);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Not 64bit compatible. Please use the constructor that takes IntPtr for the event handle")

param.span: 启动传输的文件位置的低位字。

span.span: The low word of the file position at which to start the transfer.

span.span: The high word of the file position at which to start the transfer.

param.span: 当 I/O 操作完成时终止的事件的句柄。

span.span: The handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete.

param.name: ar
param.span: 一个实现 接口并提供 I/O 操作的状态信息的对象。

span.span: An object that implements the interface and provides status information on the I/O operation.

summary.span: 用指定的文件位置、当 I/O 操作完成时终止的事件的 32 位整型句柄、以及一个用来返回操作结果的接口初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified file position, the 32-bit integer handle to an event that is signaled when the I/O operation is complete, and an interface through which to return the results of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取派生自任何托管的同步事件的句柄类。Use the property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the class. 实现提供有关 I/O 操作的状态信息。Your implementation of provides status information on the I/O operation. 将其传递给构造函数中`ar`参数，并检索其更高版本与属性。Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the property. 如果为指定的回调方法或方法，可以检索回调你通过解压缩它接收的结构。If a callback method is specified for the or method, the callback can retrieve your by unpacking the structure it receives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取派生自托管的同步对象的句柄类，而使用属性来获取对象，，然后调用方法。To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the class, use the property to get a object, and then call the method. 实现提供有关 I/O 操作的状态信息。Your implementation of provides status information on the I/O operation. 将其传递给构造函数中`ar`参数，并检索其更高版本与属性。Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the property. 如果为指定的回调方法或方法，可以检索回调你通过解压缩它接收的结构。If a callback method is specified for the or method, the callback can retrieve your by unpacking the structure it receives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法在 64 位平台上使用此属性。This property cannot be used on 64-bit platforms. 改用 属性。Use the property instead. 使用属性来获取派生自任何托管的同步事件的句柄类。Use the property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取派生自托管的同步对象的句柄类，而使用属性来获取对象，，然后调用方法。To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the class, use the property to get a object, and then call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Free(valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* nativeOverlappedPtr) cil managed

param.name: nativeOverlappedPtr
param.span: 指向要释放的 结构的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the structure to be freed.

summary.span: 释放与 方法分配的本机重叠结构关联的非托管内存。

span.span: Frees the unmanaged memory associated with a native overlapped structure allocated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用方法一次每个指针从接收方法。You must call the method exactly once on every pointer you receive from the method. 如果你不调用方法，你将会泄漏内存。If you don't call the method, you will leak memory. 如果调用方法不止一次，内存会被破坏。If you call the method more than once, memory will be corrupted.

span.span: is .

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: 获取或设置启动传输的文件位置的高序位字。

span.span: Gets or sets the high-order word of the file position at which to start the transfer.

summary.span: 文件位置是距文件起始处的字节偏移量。

span.span: The file position is a byte offset from the start of the file.

value.span: 表示文件位置高位字的 值。

span.span: An value representing the high word of the file position.

span.span: Gets or sets the low-order word of the file position at which to start the transfer.

summary.span: 文件位置是距文件起始处的字节偏移量。

span.span: The file position is a byte offset from the start of the file.

value.span: 表示文件位置低位字的 值。

span.span: An value representing the low word of the file position.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 一个 委托，表示在异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构，并指定当异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的委托。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure, specifying the delegate to be invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.

returns.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管的指针可以传递到重叠的 I/O 操作中的操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 结构固定的物理内存中，直到调用。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用方负责钉住缓冲区。The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer. 如果应用程序域被卸载，但是，固定的缓冲区的句柄销毁该对象并释放缓冲区，使 I/O 操作写入已释放的地址。If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address. 为此，最好使用方法重载中，在其中运行时钉住缓冲区。For this reason, it is better to use the method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack (System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb, object userData);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb, object userData) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 一个 委托，表示在异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

param.name: userData
param.span: 对象或对象的数组，表示用于操作的输入或输出缓冲区。

span.span: An object or array of objects representing the input or output buffer for the operation.

param.span: 每个对象都表示一个缓冲区，例如字节数组。

span.span: Each object represents a buffer, for example an array of bytes.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构，并指定当异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的委托，以及作为缓冲区的托管对象。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure, specifying a delegate that is invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete and a managed object that serves as a buffer.

returns.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管的指针可以传递到重叠的 I/O 操作中的操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 结构固定的物理内存中，直到调用。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. 缓冲区或中指定的缓冲区`userData`必须不同于传递给非托管的操作系统函数执行的异步 I/O。The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O. > [!NOTE] > 运行时固定的缓冲区或中指定的缓冲区`userData`I/O 操作的持续时间。The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in `userData` for the duration of the I/O operation. 如果卸载应用程序域时，运行时将保持固定，直到 I/O 操作完成的内存。If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Overlapped Unpack(valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* nativeOverlappedPtr) cil managed

param.name: nativeOverlappedPtr
param.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

summary.span: 将指定的非托管 结构解压缩为 对象。

span.span: Unpacks the specified unmanaged structure into a managed object.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含从本机结构解压缩的信息。

span.span: An object containing the information unpacked from the native structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构不释放从物理内存，直到你调用方法。The structure is not freed from physical memory until you call the method.

permission.span: 需要完全信任直接调用方。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure.

summary.span: 不传播该调用堆栈。

span.span: Does not propagate the calling stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* UnsafePack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 一个 委托，表示在异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构，并指定当异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的委托。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure specifying the delegate to invoke when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.

summary.span: 不传播该调用堆栈。

span.span: Does not propagate the calling stack.

returns.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管的指针可以传递到重叠的 I/O 操作中的操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 结构固定的物理内存中，直到调用。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. 调用方负责钉住缓冲区。The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer. 如果应用程序域被卸载，但是，固定的缓冲区的句柄销毁该对象并释放缓冲区，使 I/O 操作写入已释放的地址。If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address. 为此，最好使用方法重载中，在其中运行时钉住缓冲区。For this reason, it is better to use the method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer. > [!CAUTION] > 使用方法可能会无意中打开安全漏洞。Using the method could inadvertently open up a security hole. 代码访问安全性将基于堆栈的所有调用方的权限其权限检查。Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack. 方法将调用堆栈不传播。The method does not propagate the calling stack. 恶意代码可能能够利用这一点避开权限检查。Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分受信任或不透明的代码。
